title: Kupperman on Native American Exchanges - Change

content.question: Which of the following factors most extensively changed the relationship described in the excerpt by the 1760s?

choices.label: The efforts of the British government to gather tax revenue from the colonies
The British victory during the Seven Years’ War (French and Indian War)
The growth of Protestant evangelism among British colonists
The increased use of enslaved labor by British plantation owners

content.answer: The British victory during the Seven Years’ War (French and Indian War)

topic.text: 3.2: Seven Years' War (The French and Indian War)

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
